Description: Papyrus document preserving an order for payment of wine on one side (written in Coptic and Greek, along the fibres, 5 lines), and a fragmentary letter in Coptic in another hand on the other side, (written against the fibres, 8 lines). EA 75314, 75313, 75312, 75311, 75310, 75309 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118090) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118090)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Bawit Clackson 79; P.Bawit Clackson 41
